page.title: 16POLITICS-DUNTON GREEN/OTFORD
page.content:
Representation:{Sevenoaks}Constituency Mark Wolfson Tory Local Government:{Tory}Majority
Otford Society - the local{Amenities {Pressure Group.}This is the largest such society proportional to the population in Kent: half the households are represented. The Society has been successful in the redrawing of Parish Boundaries, controlling the extension of industrial building & maintaining the rural character of the village. It has worked with similar societies from Chevening & D.Green over the construction of the Chevening interchange {M25/M26}.
